artist: Artist: Hakim Bey , et al.; Publisher: Hopscotch, Dearborn, Mich.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of silhouetted hands reaching for the sky, and a floral border, with letterpress, printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 16 pp.
title: This Inheritance Must be Refused
